thread.title: How the Dow Jones industrial average fared on Friday
thread.title_full: How the Dow Jones industrial average fared on Friday

title: How the Dow Jones industrial average fared on Friday
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Aug 14, 2015, 21:29 BST - UK Markets closed How the Dow Jones industrial average fared on Friday How the Dow Jones industrial average and other major indexes fared on Friday By The Associated Press | Associated Press – 2 minutes 49 seconds ago 8.52 +0.45 
U.S. stocks rose Friday as China's currency stabilized and crude oil prices steadied after falling to a six-year low. 
Nordstrom and J.C. Penney climbed after both retailers reported better-than-expected earnings. 
For the day: 
The Dow Jones industrial average rose 69.15 points, or 0.4 percent, to 17,477.40. 
The Standard & Poor's 500 index gained 8.15 points, or 0.4 percent, to 2,091.54. 
The Nasdaq composite climbed 14.68 points, or 0.3 percent, to 5,048.24. 
For the week: 
The Dow is up 104.02 points, or 0.6 percent. 
The S&P 500 index is up 13.97 points, or 0.7 percent. 
The Nasdaq is up 4.69 points, or 0.1 percent. 
For the year: 
The Dow is down 345.67 points, or 1.9 percent. 
The S&P 500 index is up 32.64 points, or 1.6 percent. 
The Nasdaq is up 312.18 points, or 6.6 percent. Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
